scripts.postinstall: npm --prefix client ci || npm --prefix client install
scripts.build: npm run build:electron && npm run build:client
scripts.electron: npm run build && npm run start:electron
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run start:electron
scripts.package:win: npm run build && npx electron-packager . vizmatic --overwrite --platform=win32 --arch=x64 --out release --asar --executable-name vizmatic --icon client/public/ui/vizmatic_noText_logo.ico
